memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.

Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of someone more suspicious? This feels like a setup."

Diana: "Bob, if you're truly the detective, why reveal yourself so early? This feels like a desperate mafia play to mislead us and get Charlie voted out."
